page.title: 15Aboyne Highland Games
page.content: The Highland Games are maintained by a committee of local enthusiasts who fulfill an annual commitment to furnish the structure for professional Circuit athletes and local athletes, dancers and pipers. The Games are financially dependant on business Sponsorship and a good attendance of local people, visitors and tourists attracted by either their special knowledge of the activities, their nostalgia for the traditions, or their casual interest in 'Scotland for the Tourist' - a mixture of accessible beauty spots, quaint customs and tartanised activities.
